TABLE.NAME: videotime
TABLE.COMMENT: each record is one Video Time module

FIELD.NAME: completion_on_percent
FIELD.COMMENT: Completion on watch time percentage

FIELD.NAME: completion_on_percent_value
FIELD.COMMENT: Percentage value 0-100

FIELD.NAME: autoplay
FIELD.COMMENT: Automatically start playback of the video. Note that this wonâ€™t work on some devices.

FIELD.NAME: byline
FIELD.COMMENT: Show the byline on the video.

FIELD.NAME: color
FIELD.COMMENT: Specify the color of the video controls. Colors may be overridden by the embed settings of the video.

FIELD.NAME: height
FIELD.COMMENT: The exact height of the video. Defaults to the height of the largest available version of the video.

FIELD.NAME: maxheight
FIELD.COMMENT: Same as height, but video will not exceed the native size of the video.

FIELD.NAME: maxwidth
FIELD.COMMENT: Same as width, but video will not exceed the native size of the video.

FIELD.NAME: muted
FIELD.COMMENT: Mute this video on load. Required to autoplay in certain browsers.

FIELD.NAME: playsinline
FIELD.COMMENT: Play video inline on mobile devices, to automatically go fullscreen on playback set this parameter to false.

FIELD.NAME: portrait
FIELD.COMMENT: Show the portrait on the video.

FIELD.NAME: speed
FIELD.COMMENT: Show the speed controls in the preferences menu and enable playback rate API (available to PRO and Business accounts).

FIELD.NAME: title
FIELD.COMMENT: Show the title on the video.

FIELD.NAME: transparent
FIELD.COMMENT: The responsive player and transparent background are enabled by default, to disable set this parameter to false.

FIELD.NAME: width
FIELD.COMMENT: The exact width of the video. Defaults to the width of the largest available version of the video.

FIELD.NAME: label_mode
FIELD.COMMENT: If true than video will be embedded in the course page.

FIELD.NAME: viewpercentgrade
FIELD.COMMENT: If true sync view percentage to student grade

FIELD.NAME: next_activity_button
FIELD.COMMENT: Enable the next activity button

FIELD.NAME: next_activity_id
FIELD.COMMENT: CM ID of next activity. -1 is next activity in course.

FIELD.NAME: next_activity_auto
FIELD.COMMENT: Go to the next activity automatically if available.

FIELD.NAME: resume_playback
FIELD.COMMENT: If the video should resume where the user left off.

FIELD.NAME: preview_picture
FIELD.COMMENT: Preview image type

FIELD.NAME: show_description
FIELD.COMMENT: Show description in preview mode.

FIELD.NAME: show_title
FIELD.COMMENT: Show title in preview mode.

FIELD.NAME: show_tags
FIELD.COMMENT: Show tags in preview mode.

FIELD.NAME: show_duration
FIELD.COMMENT: Show duration in preview mode.

FIELD.NAME: show_viewed_duration
FIELD.COMMENT: Show view duration in preview mode.

FIELD.NAME: columns
FIELD.COMMENT: Number of columns the video will be displayed within preview mode.
